oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Soldiers
United States - History - Civil War, 1861-1865
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The last fifteen Confederate veterans living in Pulaski, Giles County, Tennessee, posing in a line. Alll men wear dark suits except the one on the far right wearing grey. Several of the men have canes.
